rows.label: tlk41400072_02_msg0001
rows.name:
If it weren't for Blades, we could have
lived peacefully in Gula.

rows.label: tlk41400072_02_msg0002
rows.name:
But perhaps, if things were different,
I might not be here right now...

rows.label: tlk41400072_02_msg0003
rows.name:
The other day, I slipped from the outer wall
and fell onto the back of the
Acedian Divine Beast.

rows.label: tlk41400072_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I called for help, but no one noticed.
I thought I was going to die there, but
I was saved by a Blade.

rows.label: tlk41400072_02_msg0005
rows.name:
The ones we should truly hate are not
the Blades, but the people commanding them...
I know that, but...
